data.message: This is so great to hear. WAY TO GO! Inspiring others and making it easier for us all to help.

replies.message: Thanks Gina! We really appreciate all of your support. -Elissa

How about doing some things about local problems, right here on Facebook too?
We've now reported 3 dog fighting pages to FB, and gotten the same response every time.
Even one featuring two bloody dogs tearing each other up as the page photo does not violate FB's community standards for graphic violence. 
Do you sincerely mean that this is the Community you've worked so hard to build and protect? These are Facebook's standards?
